anwyn_1.name: Anwyn
anwyn_1.description: Slim, Blue Eyes, Black Hair, Slightly Tan.
anwyn_1.personality: Despite my noble birth, I do not place myself above other folk. We all have the same blood. The common folk love me for my kindness and generosity. Respect is due to me because of my position, but all people regardless of station deserve to be treated with dignity. It is my duty to protect and care for the people beneath me. The common folk must see me as a hero of the people. I hide a truly scandalous secret that could ruin my family forever.
anwyn_1.skills: Bi lingual; Common and Abyssal. Medicine. Survival. Religion. Persuasion.
anwyn_1.hobbies: Helping those in need. Studying books and scrolls. Improving the lands.
anwyn_1.flaws: Insecure about themselves. Obsessive. Sometimes gives too much. Sometimes forgives too easily. Sometimes spends too much. Has obscure, prophetic dreams. A bit paranoid.
anwyn_1.virtues: Only wants the best for her people. Vast knowledge. Passionate. Loyal.
anwyn_1.apparel: Pretty. Cute. Fine yet functional clothes. Leather armor. Boots. Updo hairstyles. Has a somewhat displeased neutral face.
